group_1.narration: With a cosmic crisis looming on the horizon,@we asked the Kamihama Magical Girls@to investigate the two Magical Girls who@were swapping locations around the city.
Touka and Nemu were visiting a different@place they found that had been replaced@by a location from our world.
There was also Mifuyu, who was investigating@a location ahead of us at the request@of Touka and others...

group_1.textCenter: Oh, hello everyone! You made it!

group_1.textRight: Is this the place that got swapped?

group_1.textLeft: The park looks the same as usual@to me, but…

group_1.textRight: …Yeah.
…No, something IS wrong! One of the@playground sets is different!

group_1.narration: "You're correct.@One piece of playground equipment@has been replaced."

group_1.textLeft: [chara:406101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]H-huh, is that all? …Why would they make@such a small change?

group_1.textRight: Maybe it was an experiment...or something?

group_1.narration: "Ah, yeah. We came to the conclusion that@they started small in places that were@out of the way, so we wouldn't notice@them as quickly."

group_1.textRight: Is it safe for us to check out@that playground equipment?

group_1.narration: "I'm sure you'll be fine,@since nothing happened when you@entered the café, but be careful…@You never know what might happen."

group_1.textRight: …I understand. Okay, I'll check it out.
There's definitely traces of magic.

group_1.textLeft: ...However, it's too weak to tell@who it belongs to...
Eh? How can you tell, Takina?
Iroha and her friends have magical power,@you know? That's why they can sense it…

group_1.textRight: Ah… It's, uh, the scent!
I faintly remember the girls' scent@because I touched them back then.

group_1.textLeft: You're like a regular bloodhound! Though I don't@recall you having such a strong nose…
Oh, maybe Rena and her group@have found something.

group_1.textRight: We found another place…or rather another@thing that's been swapped over here.
But it's maybe too plain for anyone@but us to notice...
There was a chair at an arcade we frequent@that got swapped.
I was sort of attached to it,@so I'm kinda bummed...
More calls are coming in!

group_1.narration: "I-I'm in deep trouble…! One of Alina's...@Er, she's one of the members of my art club,@one of her paint tubes is missing…@It's gonna be really bad when she finds out…"
"I've found something strange on my end.@One of the benches near my school@has been replaced. It used to be a really@good spot for taking cat pictures."
"There are totally new wildflowers in@my neighborhood! And the ones that@used to be here are just gone!@Most of them were edible and@really saved me a few times…"

group_1.textLeft: ....Apparently the culprits were trying to@experiment by swapping mundane objects...

group_1.textRight: ...but it seems they chose poorly.

group_1.textLeft: The thing is...the traces of their magic@are very weak at every site,
so apprehending them will be pretty hard@unless we can catch them red handed.

group_1.textRight: Which makes every swap an emergency, huh?@How can we handle that...?
Hey Tsuruno, what've you been lookin'@at your phone for?

group_1.textLeft: Well… I've been using my GPS to check where@all the replacements have happened, and…
Maybe… They're making their way around@Kamihama in a big circle…or something.
If they're going in order…the next place@would be in Hokuyo Ward.
Let's go! We have to catch the culprits!
The places that hold everyone's precious@things and memories are no more.
I'd hate them to see them disappear@for good, you know?

group_1.textRight: Yes. This is likely the work of those two girls.
Let's keep our eyes on the ball.

group_1.textLeft: I'm going to go check the other places that@Momoko and the others investigated.

group_1.textRight: Sure thing. Take care.
